Title: Relates to providing for certain procedures to be followed when there is a determination of suspected child abuse or neglect
Summary: Provides for certain procedures to be followed when there is a determination of suspected child abuse or neglect; establishes duties to investigate; relates to examinations of the child in a suspected case of child abuse.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to providing for certain procedures to be followed when there is a determination of suspected child abuse or neglect
